name: 3D Flying Car VR Racing Simulator 2017
description:
Take to the skies with this intense 3D VR flying car game! Pick from one of 3 performance flying cars and then tear down the canyon hovering just above the ground.

Don’t smash into obstacles, this game is not for the faint of heart. Do you have what it takes?

FEATURES

- 3 flying cars!
- Realistic 3D environment!
- Falling rock hazards!
- Super HD 3D graphics!
